pr_title: Improve the handling of non-registered worlds

timeline.message: Improve the handling of non-registered worlds

timeline.bodyText: Please don't use .forEach(...), it can have quite a negative impact on performance. It is advised to use the standard for loop format instead.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: Normally it should be done only once when shutting down the server without any players already but I see the point. Agreed, should be resolved now.
replies.author: SoSeDiK

timeline.bodyText: Please do not use the star import.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText:
Yeah. I'm trying to find a solution for that :P
My IntelliJ IDEA does that automatically. I guess I'll have to set them manually, as well as add new imports for entries.
Edit: I found the option for that.
replies.author: SoSeDiK
